content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-18.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Coal Storage Facility at Position (47.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (47.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Iron Chest at position (49.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -78.5) waiting for source items

### Iron Plate Storage and Processing at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) containing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5) containing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (44.5, -80.5) containing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (45.5, -80.5) containing iron plates and coal
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between chests and furnaces

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that the inserter has access to the required source items. Verify that the connected chests contain the necessary materials.

### No Iron Ore to Insert
- Ensure that your inventory contains iron ore before attempting to transfer it to furnaces or chests. Regularly check and manage your inventory levels to prevent such issues.

### Chest at Drop Position is Full
- Regularly clear out chests that are used as drop points for mining drills to prevent them from becoming full and halting production.
